title: Meraki: The World's Most Beautiful Words - A Photography Art Book
description: (Greek. n) The love, creativity, and passion you put into something; the act of leaving a piece of yourself in your work.   Discover some of the most beautiful and poignant words around the world. Words for feelings you’ve experienced but could never name. A linguistic delight, this lovely collection of black and white photography art features over 100 words in Greek, French, German, Japanese, Korean, Sanskrit, and many others. Word lovers will unravel a rich tapestry of emotions, experiences, and cultural ties brought about by the nuanced beauty of language.
author: D.K.S. Dhara
